CVE-2016-10247.title: Artifex MuPDF CVE-2016-10247 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-10247.body: Artifex MuPDF is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to MuPDF 1.10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-10259.title: Bluecoat SSL Visibility CVE-2016-10259 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-10259.body: Bluecoat SSL Visibility is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause TCP connection pool exhaustion, leading to a denial-of-service condition. Bluecoat SSL Visibility prior to 3.11.3.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-10293.body: Google Android is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain potentially sensitive information. Information obtained may aid in further attacks. This issue is being tracked by Android Bug ID A-33352393.

CVE-2016-10309.title: Ceragon FibeAir IP-10 Web Interface Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-10309.body: Ceragon FibeAir IP-10 is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. Versions prior to Ceragon FibeAir IP-10 7.2.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-10379.title: Joomla! VirtueMart Extension 'administrator/index.php' Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-10379.body: VirtueMart extension for Joomla! is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. VirtueMart 3.0.14 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-10502.body: Qualcomm Closed-Source Components are prone to multiple unspecified vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks. These issues are being tracked by Android Bug IDs A-78244877, A-79420111, A-109677962, A-68326808, A-78240714, A-78240675, A-78241957, A-72950294, A-74235967, A-77484722, A-77484786, A-79420492, A-79420096, and A-109678529.

CVE-2016-10699.title: D-Link DSL-2740E ADSL Router Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-10699.body: D-Link DSL-2740E ADSL Router is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-10701.title: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho BA Platform CVE-2016-10701 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2016-10701.body: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho BA Platform is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability.Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2016-1253.title: Debian CVE-2016-1253 Remote Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1253.body: Debian is prone to remote command-injection vulnerability. Successful exploit allows an attacker to execute arbitrary commands with user privileges in context of the affected application. Debian 5.0.0a-1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-1328.title: Cisco Model EPC3928 Wireless Residential Gateway CVE-2016-1328 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1328.body: Cisco Model EPC3928 Wireless Residential Gateway is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCux24948. Cisco Model EPC3928 Wireless Residential Gateway 3.0 is vulnerable.

CVE-2016-1336.title: Cisco Wireless Residential Gateway CVE-2016-1336 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1336.body: Cisco Wireless Residential Gateway is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash and reload the affected device, denying service to legitimate users. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuy28100.

CVE-2016-1337.title: Cisco Wireless Residential Gateway CVE-2016-1337 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1337.body: Cisco Wireless Residential Gateway is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCux17178.

CVE-2016-1393.title: Cisco Cloud Network Automation Provisioner CVE-2016-1393 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1393.body: Cisco Cloud Network Automation Provisioner is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuy72175.

CVE-2016-1394.title: Cisco Firepower System Software CVE-2016-1394 Insecure Default Password Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1394.body: Cisco Firepower System Software is prone to an insecure default-password vulnerability. Remote attackers with knowledge of the default credentials may exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks. This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuz56238. The following products are affected : Adaptive Security Appliance (ASA) 5500-X Series with FirePOWER Services Advanced Malware Protection (AMP) for Networks, 7000 Series Appliances Advanced Malware Protection (AMP) for Networks, 8000 Series Appliances FirePOWER 7000 Series Appliances FirePOWER 8000 Series Appliances FirePOWER Threat Defense for Integrated Services Routers (ISRs) Virtual Next-Generation Intrusion Prevention System (NGIPSv) for VMware

CVE-2016-1411.title: Cisco AsyncOS Software CVE-2016-1411 Man in the Middle Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1411.body: Cisco AsyncOS Software is prone to security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to perform unauthorized actions by conducting a man-in-the-middle attack. This may lead to other attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID's CSCul88715, CSCul94617 and CSCul94627.

CVE-2016-1441.title: Cisco Configuration Assistant CVE-2016-1441 Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1441.body: Cisco Configuration Assistant is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to the affected application. This may aid in further attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco bug ID CSCuy77145. Cisco CNAP release 1.0(0), which is part of Cisco Configuration Assistant (CCA), is affected.

CVE-2016-1458.title: Cisco Firepower Management Center CVE-2016-1458 Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1458.body: Cisco Firepower Management Center is prone to a privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges on an affected device. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCur25483. Cisco Firepower Management Center and ASA 5500-X Series with FirePOWER Services versions 5.4.0, 5.3.1, 5.3.0, 5.2.0, and 4.10.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-1467.title: Cisco Videoscape Session Resource Manager CVE-2016-1467 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1467.body: Cisco Videoscape Session Resource Manager is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCva01813. Cisco Videoscape Session Resource Manager is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-1477.title: Cisco Connected Streaming Analytics CVE-2016-1477 Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1477.body: Cisco Connected Streaming Analytics is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to the affected device. This may aid in further attacks. The issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuz92891.

CVE-2016-1494.title: Python-RSA CVE-2016-1494 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1494.body: Python-RSA is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to resources.

CVE-2016-1592.title: Novell NetIQ Identity Manager CVE-2016-1592 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1592.body: Novell NetIQ Identity Manager is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Novell NetIQ Identity Manager prior to 4.5.3 are affected.

CVE-2016-1598.title: Novell NetIQ Identity Manager CVE-2016-1598 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1598.body: Novell NetIQ Identity Manager is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Novell Identity Manager 4.5 is vulnerable.

CVE-2016-1599.title: NetIQ Self Service Password Reset CVE-2016-1599 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1599.body: NetIQ Self Service Password Reset is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. NetIQ Self Service Password Reset 2.x and 3.x versions prior to 3.3.1 HF2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-1606.title: Micro Focus Rumba+ CVE-2016-1606 Multiple Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-1606.body: Micro Focus Rumba+ is prone to multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to properly parse large amounts of bytes to several functions in several OLE controls An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of an application. Micro Focus Rumba+ versions 9.4.4058.0 and 9.4.0 SP0 Patch0 are affected.

CVE-2016-1607.title: Novell Filr Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-1607.body: Micro Focus (Novell) Filr is prone to the following security vulnerabilities. 1. A cross-site request forgery 2. An OS-command injection 3. A use of known vulnerability component 4. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 5. Missing Cookie-Flags 6. An authentication bypass 7. A directory traversal vulnerability 8. An insecure file permission vulnerability An attacker can exploit these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, bypass certain security restrictions or perform unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2016-1609.title: Novell Filr Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-1609.body: Micro Focus (Novell) Filr is prone to the following security vulnerabilities. 1. A cross-site request forgery 2. An OS-command injection 3. A use of known vulnerability component 4. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 5. Missing Cookie-Flags 6. An authentication bypass 7. A directory traversal vulnerability 8. An insecure file permission vulnerability An attacker can exploit these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, bypass certain security restrictions or perform unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2016-1610.body: Micro Focus (Novell) Filr is prone to the following security vulnerabilities. 1. A cross-site request forgery 2. An OS-command injection 3. A use of known vulnerability component 4. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 5. Missing Cookie-Flags 6. An authentication bypass 7. A directory traversal vulnerability 8. An insecure file permission vulnerability An attacker can exploit these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, bypass certain security restrictions or perform unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2016-1611.title: Novell Filr Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-1611.body: Micro Focus (Novell) Filr is prone to the following security vulnerabilities. 1. A cross-site request forgery 2. An OS-command injection 3. A use of known vulnerability component 4. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 5. Missing Cookie-Flags 6. An authentication bypass 7. A directory traversal vulnerability 8. An insecure file permission vulnerability An attacker can exploit these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, bypass certain security restrictions or perform unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2016-1907.title: OpenSSH CVE-2016-1907 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1907.body: OpenSSH is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2016-1910.title: SAP Netweaver CVE-2016-1910 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1910.body: SAP Netweaver is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. SAP Netweaver 7.4 is vulnerable.

CVE-2016-1985.title: HP Operations Manager CVE-2016-1985 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1985.body: HP Operations Manager is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application.

CVE-2016-2031.title: Multiple Arubanetworks Products Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2031.body: Multiple Arubanetworks Products are prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions, obtain sensitive information, execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Following products and versions are affected: ArubaOS (all versions) are vulnerable. AirWave Management Platform 8.x prior to 8.2 are vulnerable. Aruba Instant (all versions up to, but not including, 4.1.3.0 and 4.2.3.1) are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2063.title: Linux Kernel 'drivers/thermal/supply_lm_core.c' Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2063.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Local attackers can exploit this issue to run arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts can crash the affected kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2016-2064.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2016-2064 Local Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2064.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a local memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers may be able to exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges. Failed attack attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-2065.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2016-2065 Local Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2065.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a local memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code-execution may be possible; however this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2016-2066.title: Google Nexus Qualcomm Sound Driver Multiple Privilege Escalation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2066.body: Google Nexus is prone to multiple privilege escalation vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges within the context of the kernel. Nexus 5, 5X, 6 and 6P are vulnerable. Note: Nexus 5X is affected only by CVE-2016-2066. These issues are being tracked by Android Bug IDs 26876409 and 27531992.

CVE-2016-2087.title: HexChat 'src/common/text.c' Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2087.body: HexChat is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve sensitive information and modify arbitrary files. This may aid in further attacks. HexChat 2.11.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-2140.title: OpenStack Compute (Nova) CVE-2016-2140 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2140.body: OpenStack Compute (Nova) is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2016-2202.title: Symantec ITMS Inventory Solution Application CVE-2016-2202 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2202.body: Symantec ITMS Inventory Solution Application is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow local attackers to bypass certain security restrictions. Other attacks are also possible. Symantec ITMS Inventory Solution Application 7.6 HF7 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2226.title: GNU libiberty CVE-2016-2226 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2226.body: GNU libiberty is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-2233.title: HexChat CVE-2016-2233 Stack-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2233.body: HexChat is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. HexChat 2.10.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-2246.title: HP ThinPro CVE-2016-2246 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2246.body: HP ThinPro is prone to local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the root privileges.

CVE-2016-2497.title: Google Android Framework APIs CVE-2016-2497 Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2497.body: Google Android is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges. Android versions 4.4.4, 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0 and 6.0.1 are vulnerable. This issue is being tracked by Android Bug ID A-27450489.

CVE-2016-2504.title: Google Nexus Qualcomm GPU Driver Multiple Privilege Escalation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2504.body: Google Nexus is prone to multiple privilege-escalation vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges within the context of the kernel. These issues are being tracked by Android Bug IDs A-28026365, and A-28377352.

CVE-2016-2536.title: SAP 3D Visual Enterprise Viewer CVE-2016-2536 Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2536.body: SAP 3D Visual Enterprise Viewer is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the current process. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Note: This issue was previously titled 'SAP 3D Visual Enterprise Viewer Use-After-Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. The title has been changed to better reflect security impact and the vulnerability information.

CVE-2016-2853.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2016-2853 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2853.body: Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2016-2854.body: Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges.

An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-2869.body: IBM QRadar SIEM is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. IBM BigInsights 4.2 is vulnerable.

CVE-2016-3150.title: Barco ClickShare Cross Site Scripting And Directory Traversal Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-3150.body: Barco ClickShare is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker can leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site and to view arbitrary local files and directories within the context of the webserver. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and gain access to sensitive information, which may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to Barco ClickShare 01.09.03, 01.06.02 and 01.03.02 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-3999.title: Zimbra Collaboration Suite CVE-2016-3999 Multiple Unspecified Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-3999.body: Zimbra Collaboration Suite is prone to multiple unspecified cross-site vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Zimbra Collaboration Suite 8.7.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4005.title: Huawei Wear App and Hilink APP SSL Certificate Validation Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4005.body: Huawei Wear App and Hilink APP are prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate SSL certificates. Successfully exploiting this issue allows local attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks and bypass certain security restrictions. The following technolgies are affected: WearAPP versions prior to 15.0.0.307 are vulnerable HiLink APP versions prior to 3.19.2 are vulnerable Note: This issue was previously titled 'Huawei Wear APP CVE-2016-3677 SSL Certificate Validation Local Security Bypass Vulnerability'. The title has been changed to better reflect the vulnerability information.

CVE-2016-4055.body: Moment.js is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a high CPU consumption, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Moment.js prior to 2.11.2 are vulnerable.

This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-4311.body: WSO2 Identity Server is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability and an information-disclosure vulnerability. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information, and perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. WSO2 Identity Server 5.1.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-4313.title: eXtplorer CVE-2016-4313 Local Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4313.body: eXtplorer is prone to a local directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access and write arbitrary files or to execute arbitrary files. eXtplorer 2.1.9 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-4314.title: WSO2 Carbon Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-4314.body: WSO2 Carbon is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities. 1. A local file-include vulnerability. 2. An HTML-injection vulnerability. 3. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. 4. A cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, perform unauthorized actions, execute arbitrary script code in the context of the webserver process. WSO2 Carbon 4.4.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, perform unauthorized actions, execute arbitrary script code in the context of the webserver process. WSO2 Carbon 4.4.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-4316.title: WSO2 Carbon Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-4316.body: WSO2 Carbon is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities. 1. A local file-include vulnerability. 2. An HTML-injection vulnerability. 3. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. 4. A cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, perform unauthorized actions, execute arbitrary script code in the context of the webserver process. WSO2 Carbon 4.4.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-4317.title: Atlassian Confluence 'viewmyprofile.action' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4317.body: Atlassian Confluence is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Atlassian Confluence 5.9.9 and 5.9.10 are vulnerable; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4318.title: Atlassian JIRA 'project/ViewDefaultProjectRoleActors.jspa' HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4318.body: Atlassian JIRA is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to Atlassian JIRA 7.1.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4319.title: Atlassian JIRA Server CVE-2016-4319 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4319.body: Atlassian JIRA Server is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue allows a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to Atlassian JIRA Server 7.1.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4320.title: Atlassian Bitbucket Server CVE-2016-4320 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4320.body: Atlassian Bitbucket Server is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access or read arbitrary files that contain sensitive information or to access files outside of the restricted directory to obtain sensitive information and perform other attacks. Versions prior to Atlassian Bitbucket Server 4.7.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4322.title: BMC BladeLogic Server Automation CVE-2016-4322 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4322.body: BMC BladeLogic Server Automation is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to BMC BladeLogic Server Automation 8.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4327.title: WSO2 SOA Enablement Server for Java CVE-2016-4327 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4327.body: WSO2 SOA Enablement Server for Java is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. WSO2 SOA Enablement Server for Java 6.6 build SSJ-6.6-20090827-1616 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-4342.body: PHP is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code or cause denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-4393.body: HP System Management Homepage is prone to multiple vulnerabilities: 1. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 2. A security-bypass vulnerability 3. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application and to perform unauthorized actions and bypass security restrictions.

CVE-2016-4484.body: Cryptsetup is prone to multiple local security vulnerabilities. Note #1: Red Hat, Debian, Ubuntu and Fedora based systems are vulnerable. Note #2: Systems that use Dracut instead of initramfs are also vulnerable. Note #3: The kinitram simple and powerful initram system are also vulnerable.

CVE-2016-5720.title: Skype for Windows CVE-2016-5720 Untrusted Search Path vulnerability

CVE-2016-5721.title: Zimbra Collaboration Server CVE-2016-5721 Multiple Unspecified Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-5721.body: Zimbra Collaboration Server is prone to multiple unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Zimbra Collaboration Server 8.7.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-5729.body: Multiple Lenovo Products are prone to a local code-execution vulnerability. A local attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of SMM and bypass BIOS security mechanisms.

CVE-2016-5740.body: Open-Xchange AppSuite is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected application. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-5758.body: NetIQ Access Manager is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue allows a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. NetIQ Access Manager 4.1 before 4.1.2 Hot Fix 1 and 4.2 before 4.2.2 are affected.

This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-5762.title: Novell GroupWise CVE-2016-5762 Heap Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-5762.body: Novell GroupWise is prone to a heap-overflow vulnerability because the software fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. CVE-2016-5764.body: Microfocus Rumba FTP is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. CVE-2016-6433.title: Cisco Firepower Management Center CVE-2016-6433 Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6433.body: Cisco Firepower Management Center is prone to a remote command-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands within the context of the affected application. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCva30872.

CVE-2016-6434.title: Cisco Firepower Management Center CVE-2016-6434 Local Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6434.body: Cisco Firepower Management Center is prone to a local authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCva30370.

CVE-2016-6435.title: Cisco Firepower Management Center CVE-2016-6435 Local File Include Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6435.body: Cisco Firepower Management Center is prone to a local file-include vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to obtain potentially sensitive information or to execute arbitrary local scripts in the context of the web server process. This may allow the attacker to compromise the application and the computer; other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2016-6436.title: Cisco Host Scan Package CVE-2016-6436 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6436.body: Cisco Host Scan Package is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuz14682.

CVE-2016-6444.title: Cisco Meeting Server CVE-2016-6444 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6444.body: Cisco Meeting Server is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Note: Web-Bridge users are affected. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvb03308.

CVE-2016-6446.title: Cisco Meeting Server CVE-2016-6446 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6446.body: Cisco Meeting Server is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco bug ID CSCvb03308.

CVE-2016-6449.title: Cisco FireAMP Connector Endpoint Software CVE-2016-6449 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6449.body: Cisco FireAMP Connector Endpoint Software is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvb40597.

CVE-2016-6452.title: Cisco Prime Home CVE-2016-6452 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6452.body: Cisco Prime Home is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvb71732. Cisco Prime Home Versions 5.1.1.6 and prior, and 5.2.2.2 and prior are affected affected.

CVE-2016-6454.title: Cisco Hosted Collaboration Mediation Fulfillment Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6454.body: Cisco Hosted Collaboration Mediation Fulfillment is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCva54241.

CVE-2016-6463.title: Cisco AsyncOS CVE-2016-6463 Remote Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6463.body: Cisco AsyncOS for Email Security Appliances are prone to a remote security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuz85823.

CVE-2016-6469.title: Cisco AsyncOS CVE-2016-6469 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6469.body: Cisco AsyncOS for Web Security Appliance is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to restart the proxy process, resulting in denial-of-service condition. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvb04312.

CVE-2016-6470.title: Cisco Hybrid Media Service CVE-2016-6470 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6470.body: Cisco Hybrid Media Service is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker may exploit this issue to gain elevated root privileges on the affected system. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvb81344.

CVE-2016-6473.title: Cisco IOS Software CVE-2016-6473 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6473.body: Cisco IOS Software is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug IDs CSCuu69332 and CSCux07028.

CVE-2016-6492.title: MediaTek Driver CVE-2016-6492 Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6492.body: MediaTek Driver is prone to a privilege-escalation vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.

CVE-2016-6496.title: Atlassian Crowd CVE-2016-6496 LDAP Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6496.body: Atlassian Crowd is prone to an LDAP injection vulnerability. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying distributed directory information services.

CVE-2016-6501.title: JFrog Artifactory CVE-2016-6501 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6501.body: JFrog Artifactory is prone to remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. JFrog Artifactory versions prior to 4.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6517.title: Liferay Portal 'barebone.jsp' Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6517.body: Liferay Portal is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve arbitrary files from the affected system in the context of the application. Information obtained could aid in further attacks. Liferay Portal 5.1.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-6518.title: Multiple Huawei Switches CVE-2016-6518 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6518.body: Multiple Huawei Switches are prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a memory exhaustion, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2016-6522.title: OpenBSD CVE-2016-6522 Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6522.body: OpenBSD is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a kernel panic, resulting in denial-of-service conditions; Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2016-6523.title: Dotclear CVE-2016-6523 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6523.body: Dotclear is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-6526.title: Samsung Android Phone Multiple Privilege Escalation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6526.body: Samsung Android Phone is prone to multiple privilege-escalation vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues gain elevated privileges. Samsung Mobile Phones running Android versions L 5.0, L 5.1 and M 6.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6527.title: Samsung Android Phone Multiple Privilege Escalation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6527.body: Samsung Android Phone is prone to multiple privilege-escalation vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues gain elevated privileges. Samsung Mobile Phones running Android versions L 5.0, L 5.1 and M 6.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6580.title: Python priority CVE-2016-6580 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6580.body: Python priority is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the application to consume excessive CPU resources, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to priority 1.2.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6581.title: Python HPACK CVE-2016-6581 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6581.body: Python HPACK is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to HPACK 2.3.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6588.title: Symantec IT Management Suite CVE-2016-6588 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6588.body: Symantec IT Management Suite is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Symantec IT Management Suite 8.0 is vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6589.title: Symantec IT Management Suite CVE-2016-6589 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6589.body: Symantec IT Management Suite is prone to a denial of service vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to cause a denial of service condition. Symantec IT Management Suite 8.0 is vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6637.title: Multiple Pivotal Products CVE-2016-6637 Multiple Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6637.body: Multiple Pivotal Products are prone to multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities. Exploiting these issues may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2016-6641.title: EMC ViPR SRM Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6641.body: EMC ViPR SRM is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. An arbitrary file upload vulnerability 2. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 3. An HTML injection vulnerability 4. An authentication-bypass vulnerability Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to upload arbitrary files, run malicious HTML and script codes, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, bypass the authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. Versions prior to EMC ViPR SRM 3.7.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6642.title: EMC ViPR SRM Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6642.body: EMC ViPR SRM is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. An arbitrary file upload vulnerability 2. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 3. An authentication-bypass vulnerability Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to upload arbitrary files, run malicious HTML and script codes, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, bypass the authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. CVE-2016-6651.body: Multiple Pivotal Products are prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2016-6653.body: Pivotal Cloud Foundry cf-mysql is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Pivotal Cloud Foundry cf-mysql-release 27 and 28 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6659.title: Cloud Foundry UAA CVE-2016-6659 Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6659.body: Cloud Foundry UAA is prone to a privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges on the affected application; this can also result in the attacker gaining complete control of the affected system.

CVE-2016-6668.title: Atlassian HipChat Plugin CVE-2016-6668 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6668.body: Atlassian HipChat Plugin is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Successful exploits of this issue lead to disclosure of sensitive information which may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2016-6669.title: Multiple Huawei USG Products CVE-2016-6669 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6669.body: Multiple Huawei USG Products are prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because they fail to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the affected device. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-6670.title: Multiple Huawei Products CVE-2016-6670 Insecure Random Number Generation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6670.body: Multiple Huawei Products are prone to insecure random number generation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to may identify defective device certificates, compromise them, and obtain the private key.

CVE-2016-6671.body: FFmpeg is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-7135.title: Plone Multiple Security vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-7135.body: Plone is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. An information-disclosure vulnerability 2. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities 3. An open-redirection vulnerability Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, to access sensitive information and gain unauthorized access and by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are possible.

CVE-2016-7147.title: Plone Incomplete Fix CVE-2016-7147 Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7147.body: Plone is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input data. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Plone versions prior to 4.3.12 and 5.x prior to 5.0.7 are vulnerable. NOTE: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for the issue described in BID 92752 (Plone Multiple Security vulnerabilities).

CVE-2016-7393.body: Libav is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. A remote attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. CVE-2016-7402.title: SAP Adaptive Server Enterprise SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7402.body: SAP Adaptive Server Enterprise is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. An attacker can exploit this issue to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2016-7410.title: Libdwarf CVE-2016-7410 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7410.body: Libdwarf is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application using the library. Failed exploits will result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-7435.body: SAP Netweaver is prone to multiple OS command-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary OS commands in context of the affected application.

CVE-2016-8493.body: Fortinet FortiClient is prone to a privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. FortiClient 5.4.1 and 5.4.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-8494.title: Fortinet Connect CVE-2016-8494 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8494.body: Fortinet Connect is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. A Remote attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of affected application. CVE-2016-8501.title: Yandex Browser CVE-2016-8501 Man in the Middle Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8501.body: Yandex Browser is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions by conducting a man-in-the-middle attack. This may lead to other attacks.

CVE-2016-8504.body: Yandex Browser is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to Yandex Browser 16.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-8505.title: Yandex Browser CVE-2016-8505 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8505.body: Yandex Browser is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Yandex Browser 16.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-8506.title: Yandex Browser CVE-2016-8506 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8506.body: Yandex Browser is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2016-8751.body: Apache Ranger is prone to an HTML injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2016-8913.title: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud CVE-2016-8913 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8913.body: IBM Kenexa LMS on Cloud is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve sensitive information and execute arbitrary code on server side. Versions prior to MyBB 1.8.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9480.title: Libdwarf 'dwarf_util.c' Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9480.body: Libdwarf is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition or obtain sensitive information. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. Libdwarf 2016-10-21 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

A privilege-escalation vulnerability 4. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 5. An XML external entity injection vulnerability An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, execute arbitrary commands in the context of the operating system, gain elevated privileges or cause denial-of-service conditions. ManageEngine Applications Manager 12 and 13 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9880.title: Pivotal GemFire for PCF CVE-2016-9880 Unauthenticated Access Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9880.body: Pivotal GemFire for PCF is prone to an unauthenticated-access vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain unauthenticated access to the affected application. This may aid in further attacks. Following product and versions are affected: Pivotal GemFire for PCF 1.6.x versions prior to 1.6.5 Pivotal GemFire for PCF 1.7.x versions prior to 1.7.1

CVE-2016-9885.title: Pivotal GemFire for PCF CVE-2016-9885 Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9885.body: Pivotal GemFire for PCF is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges. GemFire for PCF 1.6.x versions prior to 1.6.5 and 1.7.x versions prior to 1.7.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9891.title: Dotclear CVE-2016-9891 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-9891.body: Dotclear is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Dotclear 2.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9917.title: BlueZ Buffer Overflow and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-9917.body: BlueZ is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities and multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer.. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. BlueZ 5.42 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-9918.title: BlueZ Buffer Overflow and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-9918.body: BlueZ is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities and multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer.. CVE-2016-0221.title: IBM Cognos Business Intelligence Server CVE-2016-0221 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0221.body: IBM Cognos Business Intelligence Server is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. IBM Cognos Business Intelligence Server 10.2.2, 10.2.1.1, 10.2.1, 10.2, and 10.1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-0263.title: IBM General Parallel File System CVE-2016-0263 Unspecified Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0263.body: IBM General Parallel File System is prone to an unspecified local privilege escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges or cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-0270.title: IBM Domino CVE-2016-0270 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0270.body: IBM Domino is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform man-in-the-middle attacks and obtain sensitive information. Successful exploits will lead to other attacks. Note: This issue was previously titled 'AES-GCM CVE-2016-0270 Information Disclosure Vulnerability'. The title have been changed to better document it.

CVE-2016-0280.title: Multiple IBM Products CVE-2016-0280 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0280.body: Multiple IBM Products are prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-0281.title: IBM AIX CVE-2016-0281 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0281.body: IBM AIX is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-0282.title: IBM iNotes CVE-2016-0282 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0282.body: IBM iNotes is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to IBM iNotes 8.5.3 FP6 IF2 are affected.

CVE-2016-0331.title: IBM Rational Team Concert CVE-2016-0331 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0331.body: IBM Rational Team Concert is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because they fail to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in an unsuspecting user's browser in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-0346.title: IBM Tririga Application Platform CVE-2016-0346 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0346.body: IBM Tririga Application Platform is prone to an unspecified cross-site request forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2016-0355.title: IBM Sametime Meetings Server Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-0355.body: IBM Sametime Meetings Server is prone to following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. 2. Multiple cross-site request forgery vulnerabilities. 3. An arbitrary file upload vulnerability. 4. Multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. 5. Multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site or steal cookie-based authentication credentials, bypass security mechanisms, gain sensitive information, upload malicious files and to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application.

CVE-2016-0356.title: IBM Sametime Meetings Server Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-0356.body: IBM Sametime Meetings Server is prone to following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. 2. Multiple cross-site request forgery vulnerabilities. 3. An arbitrary file upload vulnerability. 4. Multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. 5. Multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site or steal cookie-based authentication credentials, bypass security mechanisms, gain sensitive information, upload malicious files and to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application.

CVE-2016-0358.title: IBM Sametime Proxy Server Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-0358.body: IBM Sametime Proxy Server is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple authentication-bypass vulnerabilities. 2. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. 3. Multiple information disclosure vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute script codes in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, perform certain unauthorized actions actions, or bypass certain security restrictions and to gain sensitive information. IBM Sametime 8.5.2, 8.5.2.1, 9.0, 9.0.0.1 and 9.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-0363.title: IBM Java SDK Incomplete Fix Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0363.body: IBM Java SDK is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass Java sandbox restrictions and load additional classes to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Note: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for the issue described in 61308 (IBM Java CVE-2013-3009 Unspecified Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability).

CVE-2016-0377.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5.5 ,8.5, 8.0 and 7.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-0714.body: Apache Tomcat Security Manager is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-0718.title: Expat CVE-2016-0718 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0718.body: Expat are prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-0720.title: pcs CVE-2016-0720 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0720.body: pcs is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly validate requests. Exploiting this issue allows a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to pcs 0.9.149 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-0723.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2016-0723 Local Race Condition Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0723.body: Linux kernel is prone to a local race-condition vulnerability. Local attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information or crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-0727.body: NTP Cronjob script is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain root privileges and perform unauthorized actions.

CVE-2016-0729.title: Apache Xerces-C CVE-2016-0729 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0729.body: Apache Xerces-C is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application or result in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to Apache Xerces-C 3.1.3 are vulnerable. Note: This issue was previously titled 'Apache Xerces-C CVE-2016-0729 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability'. The title has been changed to better reflect security impact and the vulnerability information.

CVE-2016-0752.body: Ruby on Rails Action View is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. A remote attacker could exploit the vulnerability using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access arbitrary files that contain sensitive information.

CVE-2016-0753.body: Ruby on Rails Active Model is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2016-0755.body: cURL/libcURL is prone to a remote security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2016-0756.body: Prosody XMPP Server is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks.

CVE-2016-0762.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2016-0762 Information Disclosure Vulnerability

CVE-2016-0766.body: PostgreSQL is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability and a privilege-escalation vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application and gain elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial of service conditions. Versions prior to PostgreSQL 9.5.1, 9.4.6, 9.3.11, 9.2.15, and 9.1.20 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-0771.title: Samba CVE-2016-0771 Out of Bound Read Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0771.body: Samba is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow the attacker to cause a denial-of-service condition.

Failed exploit attempts will result in denial of service conditions. Versions prior to PostgreSQL 9.5.1, 9.4.6, 9.3.11, 9.2.15, and 9.1.20 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-0774.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a local memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers may be able to exploit this issue to crash the system or disclose the kernel memory. CVE-2016-0778.body: OpenSSH is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-0870.body: Trane Tracer SC is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Trane Tracer SC 4.2.1134 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-0886.body: EMC Documentum xCP is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information; this may lead to further attacks. EMC Documentum xCP 2.1 and 2.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-0903.title: EMC Avamar Data Store and Avamar Virtual Edition Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-0903.body: EMC Avamar Data Store and Avamar Virtual Edition are prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability and a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit these vulnerabilities to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; which may aid in further attacks. The following products are affected: EMC Avamar Data Store (ADS) versions prior to 7.3.0 EMC Avamar Virtual Edition (AVE) versions prior to 7.3.0

CVE-2016-0904.title: EMC Avamar Data Store and Avamar Virtual Edition Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-0904.body: EMC Avamar Data Store and Avamar Virtual Edition are prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability and a security-bypass vulnerability. CVE-2016-0905.body: EMC Avamar Data Store and Avamar Virtual Edition are prone to multiple local privilege-escalation vulnerabilities. A local attacker can exploit these issues to gain elevated root privileges.

CVE-2016-0909.title: EMC Avamar Data Store and Avamar Virtual Edition Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0909.body: EMC Avamar Data Store and Avamar Virtual Edition are prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Versions of EMC Avamar Data Store (ADS) and Avamar Virtual Edition (AVE) 7.3 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-0913.body: Multiple EMC products are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. The following products are vulnerable: Versions prior to EMC Replication Manager 5.5.3 EMC Network Module for Microsoft 3.x EMC Networker Module for Microsoft 8.2.x

CVE-2016-0917.body: Multiple EMC Products are prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2016-0918.body: Multiple EMC Products are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. The following versions are vulnerable: RSA Identity Management and Governance versions prior to 6.8. RSA Identity Management and Governance versions prior to 6.9. RSA Via Lifecycle and Governance versions prior to 7.0.0 P04.

CVE-2016-0919.title: EMC RSA Web Threat Detection CVE-2016-0919 Unspecified HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-0919.body: EMC RSA Web Threat Detection is prone to an unspecified HTML-injection vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. EMC RSA Web Threat Detection 5.0, 5.1 and 5.1.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-0921.title: EMC Avamar Data Store and Avamar Virtual Edition Multiple Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-0921.body: EMC Avamar Data Store and Avamar Virtual Edition are prone to multiple local privilege-escalation vulnerabilities. A local attacker can exploit these issues to gain elevated root privileges.

CVE-2016-0925.body: EMC RSA Adaptive Authentication is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Versions of RSA Adaptive Authentication (On-Premise) prior to 7.3 are affected.

CVE-2016-1251.body: DBD::mysql is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. DBD::mysql versions 4.041 fixes the issue.

CVE-2016-1275.title: Juniper Junos CVE-2016-1275 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-1275.body: Juniper Junos is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-1277.body: Juniper Junos is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to cause kernel panic, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

These issues are fixed in Firefox 44.

CVE-2016-1970.title: Mozilla Firefox Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-1970.body: Mozilla Firefox is prone to the multiple security vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. These issues are fixed in Firefox 45.

CVE-2016-1971.title: Mozilla Firefox Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-1971.body: Mozilla Firefox is prone to the multiple security vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. These issues are fixed in Firefox 45.

CVE-2016-2037.title: CPIO CVE-2016-2037 Out of Bounds Write Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2037.body: cpio is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the cpio instance, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-2059.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2016-2059 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2059.body: Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. Linux kernel 3.x are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-2073.title: libxml2 'HTMLparser.c' Out of Bounds Read Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2073.body: libxml2 is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2016-2074.title: Open vSwitch CVE-2016-2074 Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2074.body: Open vSwitch is prone to multiple remote buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-2086.title: Node.js CVE-2016-2086 HTTP Request Smuggling Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2086.body: Node.js is prone to an HTTP-request-smuggling attack. A remote attacker may leverage this issue to poison web caches,bypass security defenses, launch cross-site scripting and HTML-injection attacks, and execute session-hijacking attacks. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2016-2088.title: ISC BIND CVE-2016-2088 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2088.body: ISC BIND is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users. ISC BIND versions 9.10.0 through 9.10.3-P3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2089.title: JasPer 'jas_seq.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2089.body: JasPer is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2016-2097.title: Ruby on Rails Action View CVE-2016-2097 Incomplete Fix Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2097.body: Ruby on Rails Action View is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. A remote attacker could exploit the vulnerability using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access arbitrary files that contain sensitive information. Note: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for the issue described in 81801 (Ruby on Rails Action View CVE-2016-0752 Directory Traversal Vulnerability).

CVE-2016-2098.title: Ruby on Rails Action Pack CVE-2016-2098 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2098.body: Ruby on Rails Action Pack is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code on the affected system.
