CVE-2016-2109.title: OpenSSL 'crypto/asn1/a_d2i_fp.c' Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2109.body: OpenSSL is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to crash the application or consume excessive amount of data, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-2116.title: JasPer Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2116.body: JasPer is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of these issues, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. JasPer 1.900.1 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2117.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2016-2117 Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2117.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Successfully exploiting this issue can allow attackers to gain sensitive information. Due to the nature of this issue, attackers may also be able to execute arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed. Linux kernel 3.8 through 4.5 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-2121.title: Redis CVE-2016-2121 Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2121.body: Redis is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2016-2123.title: Samba CVE-2016-2123 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2123.body: Samba is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in a denial of service. The following versions are vulnerable: Samba 4.3.x prior to 4.3.13 Samba 4.4.x prior to 4.4.8 Samba 4.5.x prior to 4.5.3

CVE-2016-2125.title: Samba CVE-2016-2125 User Impersonation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2125.body: Samba is prone to a user-impersonation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to impersonate arbitrary users and perform unauthorized actions. Samba 3.0.25 through 4.5.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2126.title: Samba CVE-2016-2126 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2126.body: Samba is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the application to crash the winbindd process, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2016-2141.title: JGroups CVE-2016-2141 Authorization Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2141.body: JGroups is prone to an authorization-bypass vulnerability. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.

CVE-2016-2161.title: Apache HTTP Server CVE-2016-2161 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2161.body: Apache HTTP Server is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to exhaust the memory; resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Apache versions 2.4.23, 2.4.20, 2.4.18, 2.4.17, 2.4.16, 2.4.12, 2.4.10, 2.4.9, 2.4.7, 2.4.6, 2.4.4, 2.4.3, 2.4.2, and 2.4.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2162.title: Apache Struts CVE-2016-2162 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2162.body: Apache Struts is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Apache Struts versions 2.0.0 through 2.3.24.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2176.body: OpenSSL is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Following product versions are affected: OpenSSL versions 1.0.2 prior to 1.0.2h OpenSSL versions 1.0.1 prior to 1.0.1t

CVE-2016-2177.title: OpenSSL CVE-2016-2177 Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2177.body: OpenSSL is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. OpenSSL 1.0.2h and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2178.title: OpenSSL CVE-2016-2178 Side Channel Attack Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2178.body: OpenSSL is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2016-2179.title: OpenSSL CVE-2016-2179 Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2179.body: OpenSSL is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to cause a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to OpenSSL 1.1.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2180.title: OpenSSL CVE-2016-2180 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2180.body: OpenSSL is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-2181.title: OpenSSL CVE-2016-2181 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2181.body: OpenSSL is prone to denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to OpenSSL 1.1.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2182.title: OpenSSL 'BN_bn2dec()' Function Out of Bounds Write Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2182.body: OpenSSL is prone to denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-2183.title: SSL/TLS Protocol CVE-2016-2183 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2183.body: SSL/TLS Protocol is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2016-2183.title: RETIRED: Oracle Java SE CVE-2016-2183 Remote Security Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2183.body: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote security vulnerability. The vulnerability can be exploited over multiple protocols. This issue affects the 'Libraries' sub-component. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: Java SE 6u131, Java SE 7u121, Java SE 8u111, Java SE 8u112

CVE-2016-2197.title: QEMU 'hw/ide/ahci.c' NULL Pointer Dereference Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2197.body: QEMU is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the QEMU process, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-2200.title: Siemens SIMATIC S7-1500 CVE-2016-2200 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2200.body: Siemens SIMATIC S7-1500 is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers may exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions, denying service to legitimate users. Versions prior to SIMATIC S7-1500 1.8.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2201.title: Siemens SIMATIC S7-1500 CVE-2016-2201 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2201.body: Siemens SIMATIC S7-1500 is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2016-2205.title: Mutiple Symantec Products CVE-2016-2205 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2205.body: Mutiple Symantec products are prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using directory-traversal characters ('../') to perform unauthorized actions. The following products are affected: Symantec Workspace Streaming versions 7.6.0 and 7.5.x. Symantec Workspace Virtualization versions 7.6.0 and 7.5.x.

CVE-2016-2206.title: Mutiple Symantec Products CVE-2016-2206 Arbitrary File Read Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2206.body: Mutiple Symantec products are prone to a security vulnerability that allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to read arbitrary files in the context of the user running the affected application. This may aid in further attacks. The following products are affected: Symantec Workspace Streaming versions 7.6.0 and 7.5.x. Symantec Workspace Virtualization versions 7.6.0 and 7.5.x.

CVE-2016-2207.title: Multiple Symantec Products CVE-2016-2207 RAR Decompression Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2207.body: Multiple Symantec products are prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-2208.title: Symantec Antivirus Engine CVE-2016-2208 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2208.body: Symantec Antivirus Engine is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. An attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with root privileges. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-2209.title: Multiple Symantec Products CVE-2016-2209 Dec2SS Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2209.body: Multiple Symantec products are prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable system. Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-2210.title: Multiple Symantec Products CVE-2016-2210 Dec2LHA Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2210.body: Multiple Symantec products are prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable system. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-2211.title: Multiple Symantec Products CVE-2016-2211 CAB Decompression Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2211.body: Multiple Symantec products are prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2016-2216.title: Node.js CVE-2016-2216 HTTP Response Splitting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2216.body: Node.js is prone to an HTTP response-splitting vulnerability. Attackers can leverage this issue to influence or misrepresent how web content is served, cached, or interpreted. This could aid in various attacks that try to entice client users into having a false sense of trust. The following versions are affected: Node.js 0.10.x versions prior to 0.10.42 Node.js 0.12.x versions prior to 0.12.10 LTS Node.js 4.x versions prior to 4.3.0 LTS Node.js 5.x versions prior to 5.6.0

CVE-2016-2274.title: A850 Telemetry Gateway Base Station CVE-2016-2274 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2274.body: A850 Telemetry Gateway Base Station is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-2315.title: GIT Multiple Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2315.body: GIT is prone to multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code on the affected system. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to GIT 2.7.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2317.title: GraphicsMagick Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2317.body: GraphicsMagick is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. GraphicsMagick is prone to the following vulnerabilities: 1. Heap-overflow vulnerability 2. Stack-overflow vulnerability 3. Heap-overflow vulnerability 4. Multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities Exploiting these issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or trigger denial-of-service conditions, denying services to legitimate users. GraphicsMagick 1.3.23 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-2318.title: GraphicsMagick Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2318.body: GraphicsMagick is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. GraphicsMagick is prone to the following vulnerabilities: 1. Heap-overflow vulnerability 2. Stack-overflow vulnerability 3. Heap-overflow vulnerability 4. Multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities Exploiting these issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or trigger denial-of-service conditions, denying services to legitimate users. GraphicsMagick 1.3.23 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-2324.title: GIT Multiple Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2324.body: GIT is prone to multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code on the affected system. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to GIT 2.7.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2326.title: FFmpeg CVE-2016-2326 Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2326.body: FFmpeg is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed attacks may cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-2329.title: FFmpeg 'libavcodec/tiff.c' Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2329.body: FFmpeg is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of these issues, code-execution may be possible; however this has not been confirmed. Versions prior to FFmpeg 2.8.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2330.title: FFmpeg 'libavcodec/gif.c' CVE-2016-2330 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2330.body: FFmpeg is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow the attacker to cause a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. Versions prior to FFmpeg 2.8.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2334.title: 7-Zip Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2334.body: 7-Zip is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. 7-Zip 15.05 beta and 9.20 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-2335.title: 7-Zip Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2335.body: 7-Zip is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. 7-Zip 15.05 beta and 9.20 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-2339.title: Ruby 'initialize()' Function Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2339.body: Ruby is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the affected function. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application. Ruby 2.3.0 dev and 2.2.2 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-2391.title: QEMU 'hw/usb/hcd-ohci.c' Null Pointer Dereference Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2391.body: QEMU is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the QEMU process, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-2399.title: libquicktime 'quicktime_read_pascal()' Function Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2399.body: libquicktime is prone to a remote integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. libquicktime 1.2.4 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2403.title: Symfony CVE-2016-2403 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2403.body: Symfony is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. Symfony versions prior to 2.8.6 and 3.x prior to 3.0.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2408.title: Multiple Pulse Secure Products CVE-2016-2408 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2408.body: Multiple Pulse Secure products are prone to local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to escalate their access to administrative privileges.

CVE-2016-2512.title: Django CVE-2016-2512 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2512.body: Django is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-2513.title: Django CVE-2016-2513 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2513.body: Django is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2016-2516.title: NTP CVE-2016-2516 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2516.body: NTP is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2016-2517.title: NTP CVE-2016-2517 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2517.body: NTP is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users. Versions prior to NTP 4.2.8p7 and 4.3.x versions prior to 4.3.92 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2518.title: NTP CVE-2016-2518 Denial of Service Vulnerability

CVE-2016-2538.body: QEMU is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed attacks may cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-2548.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2016-2548 Multiple Local Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2548.body: Linux Kernel is prone to multiple local denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Successful exploitation of these issues cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-2549.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2016-2549 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2549.body: The Linux Kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-2563.title: PuTTY CVE-2016-2563 Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-2563.body: PuTTY is prone to multiple remote buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-2565.title: Samsung SecEmailSync CVE-2016-2565 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2565.body: Samsung SecEmailSync is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information; this may lead to further attacks. Samsung SecEmailSync on SM-G920F build G920FXXU2COH2 (Galaxy S6) is vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2566.title: Samsung SecEmailSync CVE-2016-2566 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2566.body: Samsung SecEmailSync is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Samsung SecEmailSync on SM-G920F build G920FXXU2COH2 (Galaxy S6) devices are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-2774.title: ISC DHCP CVE-2016-2774 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-2774.body: ISC DHCP is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. ISC DHCP versions 4.1.0 through 4.1-ESV-R12-P1,4.2.0 through 4.2.8 and 4.3.0 through 4.3.3-P1 are vulnerable. Older versions also may be affected.

Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed attacks will cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2016-3378.title: Microsoft Exchange Server CVE-2016-3378 Open Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3378.body: Microsoft .NET Framework is prone to an open-redirection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can leverage this issue by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are possible.

CVE-2016-3379.title: Microsoft Exchange Server CVE-2016-3379 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3379.body: Microsoft Exchange Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. The following versions are affected: Microsoft Exchange Server 2016 Cumulative Update 1 Microsoft Exchange Server 2016 Cumulative Update 2

CVE-2016-3382.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer and Edge CVE-2016-3382 Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3382.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer and Edge are prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a specially crafted web page. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed attacks will cause denial of service conditions. Edge and Internet explorer 9, 10 and 11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-3383.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed attacks will cause denial of service conditions. CVE-2016-3388.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer and Edge are prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges. Successful exploits may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2016-3396.title: Microsoft Windows Graphics Component CVE-2016-3396 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3396.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed attacks will cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2016-3473.title: Oracle Fusion Middleware CVE-2016-3473 Remote Security Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3473.body: Oracle Fusion Middleware is prone to a remote vulnerability in BI Publisher (formerly XML Publisher). The vulnerability can be exploited over the 'HTTP' protocol. The 'Security' sub component is affected. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: 11.1.1.7.0, 11.1.1.9.0, 12.2.1.0.0

CVE-2016-3562.title: Oracle Database Server CVE-2016-3562 Remote Security Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3562.body: Oracle Database Server is prone to a remote security vulnerability in RDBMS Security and SQL*Plus. The vulnerability can be exploited over the 'Oracle Net' protocol. For an exploit to succeed, the attacker must have 'DBA level privileged account' privileges. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: 11.2.0.4, 12.1.0.2

CVE-2016-3619.body: LibTIFF is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. LibTIFF versions prior to 4.0.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-3624.title: LibTIFF CVE-2016-3624 Out Of Bounds Write Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3624.body: LibTIFF is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. LibTIFF 4.0.6 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-3627.body: Libxml2 is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code-execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2016-3632.body: LibTIFF is prone to an arbitrary command-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands or cause a denial-of-service condition. LibTIFF 4.0.6 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-3632.body: LibTIFF is prone to an arbitrary command-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands or cause a denial-of-service condition. LibTIFF 4.0.6 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-3634.body: LibTIFF is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. LibTIFF 4.0.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-3644.body: Multiple Symantec products are prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2016-3646.body: Multiple Symantec Products are prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-3650.body: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager and Client are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager 12.1-RU6-MP5 are affected.

CVE-2016-3651.body: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager and client are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. The following products are affected: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager 12.1 versions prior to 12.1-RU6-MP5 Symantec Endpoint Protection Client 12.1 versions prior to 12.1-RU6-MP5

CVE-2016-3653.body: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager and Client are prone to multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities. CVE-2016-3658.body: LibTIFF is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. LibTIFF 4.0.6 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-3659.title: Cacti '/cacti/graph_view.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3659.body: Cacti is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Cacti 0.8.8g is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-3674.title: XStream CVE-2016-3674 XML External Entity Multiple Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-3674.body: XStream is prone to multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to gain access to sensitive information from the application; this may lead to further attacks. Note: This issue was previously titled 'XStream XML External Entity Denial of Service Vulnerability'. The title has been changed to better reflect the vulnerability information. Versions prior to XStream 1.4.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-3699.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux CVE-2016-3699 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3699.body: Red Hat Enterprise Linux is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks. Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.2 is vulnerable.

CVE-2016-3705.title: libxml2 CVE-2016-3705 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3705.body: libxml2 is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-3710.body: QEMU is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with privileges of the Qemu process on the host. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code on the system. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2016-3960.title: Xen CVE-2016-3960 NULL pointer Dereference Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3960.body: Xen is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Xen 3.4 and later versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-3961.title: Xen CVE-2016-3961 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3961.body: Xen is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the kernel, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-3977.title: giflib CVE-2016-3977 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3977.body: giflib is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code on the affected system. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. giflib 5.1.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-3990.title: LibTIFF CVE-2016-3990 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3990.body: The LibTIFF is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands or cause denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-3991.title: LibTIFF 'tiffcrop.c' Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3991.body: The LibTIFF is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application using the library. Failed exploits will result in denial-of-service conditions. LibTIFF 4.6.0 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-3995.title: Crypto++ CVE-2016-3995 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-3995.body: Crypto++ is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2016-4003.title: Apache Struts CVE-2016-4003 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4003.body: Apache Struts is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Apache Struts versions 2.x prior to 2.3.28 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4009.title: Python Pillow CVE-2016-4009 Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4009.body: Python Pillow is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied input before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code-execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. Pillow versions prior to 3.1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4024.title: Imlib2 'image.h' Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4024.body: Imlib2 is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-4036.title: OpenSUSE and SUSE Linux Enterprise Server CVE-2016-4036 Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4036.body: OpenSUSE and SUSE Linux Enterprise Server are prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2016-4049.title: Quagga Routing Software Suite CVE-2016-4049 Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4049.body: Quagga Routing Software Suite is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-4066.title: Fortinet FortiWeb CVE-2016-4066 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4066.body: Fortinet FortiWeb is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it does not properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. Versions of Fortinet FortiWeb prior to 5.5.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4069.title: RoundCube Webmail CVE-2016-4069 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4069.body: RoundCube Webmail is prone to a cross-site request forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. This may lead to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.

CVE-2016-4070.title: PHP 'php_raw_url_encode()' Function Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4070.body: PHP is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. PHP versions prior to 5.6.20 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4071.title: PHP 'snmp.c' Remote Format String Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4071.body: PHP is prone to a remote format-string vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-4072.title: PHP PHAR Out of Bounds Write Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4072.body: PHP is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to cause a denial of service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible; this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2016-4073.title: PHP 'libmbfl/mbfl/mbfilter.c' Function Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4073.body: PHP is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow the attacker to crash the affected application resulting in denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-4085.title: Wireshark NCP Dissector 'packet-ncp2222.inc' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4085.body: Wireshark is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly handle certain types of packets. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution is possible but this has not been confirmed. Wireshark versions 1.12.0 through 1.12.10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4091.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to multiple unspecified heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-4168.title: Adobe Experience Manager CVE-2016-4168 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4168.body: Adobe Experience Manager is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-4300.title: libarchive CVE-2016-4300 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4300.body: libarchive is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. libarchive 3.1.2 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-4301.title: Libarchive CVE-2016-4301 Local Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4301.body: libarchive is prone to a local heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-4302.title: Libarchive CVE-2016-4302 Local Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4302.body: libarchive is prone to a local heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-4323.title: Pidgin Multiple Security Vulnerabilities

An attacker can exploit these issues to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or execute arbitrary code, overwrite arbitrary files and obtain sensitive information. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to Pidgin 2.11.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4331.title: HDF5 CVE-2016-4331 Local Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4331.body: HDF5 is prone to an local heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability. Specifically, this issue occur when the library is decoding data out of a dataset encoded with the 'H5Z_NBIT' decoding. A local attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of affected application. Failed attempts may lead to denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-4380.title: HP Operations Manager CVE-2016-4380 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability

CVE-2016-4406.title: HP Integrated Lights-Out CVE-2016-4406 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4406.body: HP Integrated Lights-Out is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in an unsuspecting user's browser in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to HP Integrated Lights-Out 4 running firmware 2.44 and HP Integrated Lights-Out 3 running firmware 1.88 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4621.title: Apple Mac OS X APPLE-SA-2016-07-18-1 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-4621.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code, gain sensitive information, cause denial-of-service conditions, bypass security restrictions, and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in other attacks. Apple Mac OS X 10.9.5, 10.10.5 and 10.11 through 10.11.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4622.title: Apple iOS/tvOS/Safari Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-4622.body: Apple iOS, tvOS and Safari are prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code, gain sensitive information or steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to iOS 9.3.3, tvOS 9.2.2 and Safari 9.1.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4650.title: Apple tvOS/Mac OS X/iOS CVE-2016-4650 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4650.body: Apple tvOS, Mac OS X and iOS are prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code on the affected system with kernel privileges. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition. Note: This issue was previously titled 'PHP CVE-2016-4650 Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities'. The title has been changed to better reflect the vulnerability information.

CVE-2016-4651.title: WebKit Content Spoofing and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-4651.body: WebKit is prone to a cross-site scripting and a content spoofing vulnerabilities because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible.

Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code, gain sensitive information, cause denial-of-service conditions, bypass security restrictions, and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in other attacks. These issues are fixed in: Apple macOS 10.12

CVE-2016-4802.title: cURL CVE-2016-4802 DLL Loading Local Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4802.body: cURL is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers execute arbitrary code. An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing a legitimate user to use the vulnerable application to open a customized library file from application path which contains a specially crafted code. Successful exploit allows attacker to execute local code with elevated privileges. cURL 7.11.1 through 7.49.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4804.title: dosfstools Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-4804.body: dosfstools is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities. dosfstools is prone to the following vulnerabilities: 1. A local memory-corruption vulnerability 2. A local denial-of-service vulnerability 3. Multiple local heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-4805.title: Linux kernel 'ppp_generic.c' Use After Free Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4805.body: Linux kernel is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code-execution may be possible; however this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2016-4809.title: libarchive CVE-2016-4809 Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4809.body: libarchive is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Given the nature of this issue, attackers may also be able to execute arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed. Note: This issue was previously titled 'libarchive CVE-2016-5844 Denial Of Service Vulnerability'. The title has been changed to better reflect the vulnerability information.

CVE-2016-4833.title: WordPress Nofollow Links Plugin 'nofollow-links.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4833.body: The Nofollow Links plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Nofollow Links 1.0.10 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4834.title: Vtiger CRM CVE-2016-4834 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4834.body: Vtiger CRM is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to other attacks. Vtiger CRM 6.4.0 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4837.title: EC-CUBE Coupon Plugin CVE-2016-4837 Unspecified SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4837.body: Coupon plugin for EC-CUBE is prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Coupon Plugin 1.5 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4838.title: Money Forward Apps for Android CVE-2016-4838 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4838.body: Money Forward Apps for Android are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2016-4839.title: Money Forward Apps for Android CVE-2016-4839 Security Vulnerability

CVE-2016-4843.title: Cybozu Mailwise CVE-2016-4843 Information Disclosure Vulnerability

CVE-2016-4847.title: OSSEC Web UI CVE-2016-4847 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4847.body: OSSEC Web UI is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Web UI 0.9 is vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4848.title: ClipBucket CVE-2016-4848 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4848.body: ClipBucket is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to ClipBucket 2.8.1 RC2 are vulnerable.

This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Geeklog IVYWE 2.1.1 is vulnerable.

Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. This may lead to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.

CVE-2016-4856.title: Splunk Enterprise and Splunk Lite CVE-2016-4856 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4856.body: Splunk Enterprise and Splunk Lite Flag Lists is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The following versions are affected: Splunk Enterprise 6.3.x prior to 6.3.5 are vulnerable. Splunk Light 6.3.x prior to 6.3.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-4860.title: Yokogawa STARDOM CVE-2016-4860 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4860.body: Yokogawa STARDOM is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass authentication mechanism and execute arbitrary commands. The following versions are vulnerable: Yokogawa STARDOM FCJ versions from R1.01 to R4.01 are vulnerable. Yokogawa STARDOM FCN versions from R1.01 to R4.01 are vulnerable

CVE-2016-4862.title: CS-Cart add-on 'Twigmo' CVE-2016-4862 PHP Object Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-4862.body: CS-Cart add-on 'Twigmo' is prone to a PHP object injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to inject arbitrary object in to the application to delete files, view files and execute local script code and to access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database execute arbitrary PHP code through specially crafted serialized objects. The following versions are affected: 'Twigmo' bundled with CS-Cart v4.3.9 and prior are affected. 'Twigmo' bundled with CS-Cart Multi-Vendor 4.3.9 and prior are affected.

CVE-2016-4891.title: SetucoCMS Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-4891.body: SetucoCMS is prone to the following security vulnerabilities. 1. A Cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. 2. A Cross-site scripting Vulnerability. 3. An SQL-injection vulnerability. 4. An unspecified denial-of-service vulnerability. 5. A code injection vulnerability. 6. Weak session management vulnerability. Attackers can exploit these issues to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, to execute arbitrary scripts in the context of the web server process, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database or to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application and to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Failed attacks may cause a denial of service condition. This may aid in launching further attacks.

PHP 5.5.x versions prior to 5.5.36 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-5095.title: PHP 'php_filter_full_special_chars()' Function Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-5095.body: PHP is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-5096.title: PHP 'ext/standard/file.c' Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-5096.body: PHP is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. An attacker may exploit these issues to cause a denial-of-service condition. PHP 5.5.x versions prior to 5.5.36 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-5099.title: phpMyAdmin Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-5099.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a security bypass vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks. phpMyAdmin 4.4.x prior to 4.4.15.6 and 4.6.x prior to 4.6.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-5102.title: LibTIFF CVE-2016-5102 Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-5102.body: LibTIFF is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code-execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2016-5107.title: QEMU 'megasas_lookup_frame()' Function Out of Bounds Read Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-5107.body: QEMU is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the QEMU instance, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-5108.title: VLC Media Player CVE-2016-5108 Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-5108.body: VLC Media Player is prone to an arbitrary code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-5124.title: Open-Xchange AppSuite CVE-2016-5124 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-5124.body: Open-Xchange AppSuite is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected application. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-5126.title: QEMU 'block/iscsi.c' Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-5126.body: QEMU is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code on the host with the privileges of the hosting QEMU process. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-5127.body: Google Chrome is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the browser, bypass security restriction and perform unauthorized actions, cause denial-of-service conditions, retrieve sensitive information; other attacks may also be possible. Versions prior to Chrome 52.0.2743.82 are vulnerable. CVE-2016-5250.title: Mozilla Firefox Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-5250.body: Mozilla Firefox is prone to the following vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities 2. A local arbitrary file-overwrite vulnerability 3. Multiple spoofing vulnerabilities 4. An integer-overflow vulnerability An attacker can exploit these issues to conduct spoofing attacks, bypass security restrictions, overwrite arbitrary files, and execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. These issues are fixed in: Firefox 48 Note: The issue described by CVE-2016-0718 has been moved to BID 90729 (Expat CVE-2016-0718 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability) for better documentation.

CVE-2016-5301.title: Libtorrent CVE-2016-5301 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-5301.body: Libtorrent is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Libtorrent 1.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-5303.title: Horde Groupware Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-5303.body: Horde Groupware is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Horde Groupware and Horde Groupware Webmail Edition 5.2.16 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-5305.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager and Client CVE-2016-5305 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-5305.body: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager and Client are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks. The following products are affected: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager 12.1 versions prior to 12.1-RU6-MP5 Symantec Endpoint Protection Client 12.1 versions prior to 12.1-RU6-MP5

CVE-2016-5306.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager and Client CVE-2016-5306 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-5306.body: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager and Client are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. The following products are affected: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager 12.1 versions prior to 12.1-RU6-MP5 Symantec Endpoint Protection Client 12.1 versions prior to 12.1-RU6-MP5

CVE-2016-5307.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager and Client CVE-2016-5307 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-5307.body: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager and Client are prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access or read arbitrary files that contain sensitive information or to access files outside of the restricted directory to obtain sensitive information and perform other attacks. The following products are affected: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager 12.1 versions prior to 12.1-RU6-MP5 Symantec Endpoint Protection Client 12.1 versions prior to 12.1-RU6-MP5

CVE-2016-5994.title: IBM InfoSphere Information Server CVE-2016-5994 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-5994.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.5 is vulnerable.

CVE-2016-5995.title: Multiple IBM DB2 Products CVE-2016-5995 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-5995.body: Multiple IBM DB2 Products are prone to an local privilege escalation vulnerability. Specifically, this issue occur because it fails to properly validate input before loading libraries. An attacker can exploit this issue by placing a crafted library in a location that a 'SETGID' or 'SETUID' binary would execute. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to gain root privileges.

CVE-2016-6018.title: IBM Emptoris Contract Management CVE-2016-6018 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6018.body: IBM Emptoris Contract Management is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2016-6019.title: IBM Emptoris Strategic Supply Management Cross Site Scripting and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6019.body: IBM Emptoris Strategic Supply Management is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may leverage these issues to cause a denial-of-service condition or to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-6038.title: IBM AIX CVE-2016-6038 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6038.body: IBM AIX is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to read arbitrary files in the context of the application. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2016-6079.title: IBM AIX CVE-2016-6079 Unspecified Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6079.body: IBM AIX is prone to an unspecified local privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain root privileges.

CVE-2016-6083.title: IBM Tivoli Monitoring SOAP Server CVE-2016-6083 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6083.body: IBM Tivoli Monitoring SOAP Server is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to obtain sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. IBM Tivoli Monitoring SOAP (KSH component) versions 6.2.2 through 6.2.2 Fix Pack 9, 6.2.3 through 6.2.3 Fix Pack 5 and 6.3.0 through 6.3.0 Fix Pack 7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6087.title: IBM Domino CVE-2016-6087 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6087.body: IBM Domino is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information. Successful exploits will lead to other attacks.

CVE-2016-6102.title: IBM Security Key Lifecycle Manager CVE-2016-6102 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6102.body: IBM Security Key Lifecycle Manager is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information; this may lead to further attacks. The following versions are affected: IBM Security Key Lifecycle Manager 2.5 through 2.5.0.7. IBM Security Key Lifecycle Manager 2.6 through 2.6.0.2.

CVE-2016-6113.title: IBM iNotes and Domino CVE-2016-6113 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6113.body: IBM iNotes and Domino are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-6114.title: IBM Emptoris Sourcing Multiple Cross Site Scripting and Open Redirection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6114.body: IBM Emptoris Sourcing is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and an open-redirection vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, this may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks or by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it and when an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site. IBM Emptoris Sourcing 9.5.x through 10.1.x are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6117.title: IBM Security Key Lifecycle Manager CVE-2016-6117 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6117.body: IBM Security Key Lifecycle Manager is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. CVE-2016-6118.body: IBM Emptoris Supplier Lifecycle Management is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. CVE-2016-6121.title: IBM Emptoris Supplier Lifecycle Management Cross Site Scripting and Open Redirection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6121.body: IBM Emptoris Supplier Lifecycle Management is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and multiple open-redirection vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site and steal cookie-based authentication credentials, or craft a URI and entice a user to follow the link to redirect victim to an attacker-controlled site and conduct phishing attacks.

CVE-2016-6127.title: Request Tracker CVE-2016-6127 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6127.body: Request Tracker is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. CVE-2016-6128.title: libgd CVE-2016-6128 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6128.body: libgd is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-6132.title: libgd 'src/gd_tga.c' Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6132.body: libgd is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause to obtain sensitive information or cause denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2016-6153.body: SQLite is prone to a security vulnerability because it creates temporary files in an insecure manner. An attacker with local access could potentially exploit this issue to perform symbolic-link attacks, overwriting arbitrary files in the context of the affected application. Versions prior to SQLite 3.13.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6170.body: ISC BIND is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users. ISC BIND version 9.10.4-P1 and prior are affected.

CVE-2016-6173.title: Multiple DNS Servers Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6173.body: Multiple DNS Servers are prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2016-6186.title: Django CMS 'Editor - Snippets' Module HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6186.body: Django CMS is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Django CMS 3.3.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-6187.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2016-6187 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

CVE-2016-6347.title: RESTEasy CVE-2016-6347 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6347.body: RESTEasy is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-6349.title: systemd CVE-2016-6349 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6349.body: systemd is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2016-6355.body: Cisco IOS XR Software is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to reload the affected device, denying service to legitimate users. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCux26791. Cisco IOS XR Software Releases 5.1.x, 5.2.x, and 5.3.x are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6356.body: Cisco AsyncOS for Email Security Appliance is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to restart the device, resulting in denial-of-service condition. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuz63143.

CVE-2016-6366.title: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance Products CVE-2016-6366 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6366.body: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance products are prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code or cause reload of the affected device, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCva92151. Cisco ASA Software running on the following products are affected: Cisco ASA 5500 Series Adaptive Security Appliances Cisco ASA 5500-X Series Next-Generation Firewalls Cisco ASA Services Module for Cisco Catalyst 6500 Series Switches and Cisco 7600 Series Routers Cisco ASA 1000V Cloud Firewall Cisco Adaptive Security Virtual Appliance (ASAv) Cisco Firepower 9300 ASA Security Module Cisco PIX Firewalls Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM)

CVE-2016-6369.body: Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands with elevated SYSTEM privileges. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuz92464.

CVE-2016-6370.title: Cisco Hosted Collaboration Mediation Fulfillment CVE-2016-6370 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6370.body: Cisco Hosted Collaboration Mediation Fulfillment is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve arbitrary files in the context of the application. This may aid in further attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuz27255 Cisco Hosted Collaboration Mediation Fulfillment (HCM-F) 10.6(3) and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6371.title: Cisco Hosted Collaboration Mediation Fulfillment CVE-2016-6371 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6371.body: Cisco Hosted Collaboration Mediation Fulfillment is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Exploiting this issue can allow an attacker to write out arbitrary files. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuz64717.
