CVE-2016-6630.title: phpMyAdmin CVE-2016-6630 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6630.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. phpMyAdmin versions 4.6.x prior to 4.6.4, 4.4.x prior to 4.4.15.8, and 4.0.x prior to 4.0.10.17 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6631.title: phpMyAdmin CVE-2016-6631 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6631.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability . An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. The following versions are affected: phpMyAdmin 4.6.x versions prior to 4.6.4 phpMyAdmin 4.4.x versions prior to 4.4.15.8 phpMyAdmin 4.0.x versions prior to 4.0.10.17

CVE-2016-6632.title: phpMyAdmin CVE-2016-6632 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6632.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. phpMyAdmin versions 4.6.x prior to 4.6.4, 4.4.x prior to 4.4.15.8, and 4.0.x prior to 4.0.10.17 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6634.title: WordPress CVE-2016-6634 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6634.body: WordPress is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-6644.title: EMC Documentum D2 CVE-2016-6644 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6644.body: EMC Documentum D2 is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. The following versions are vulnerable: EMC Documentum D2 4.5 version prior to 4.5 patch 15 EMC Documentum D2 4.6 version prior to 4.6 patch 03

CVE-2016-6645.title: Dell EMC vApp Manager Multiple Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6645.body: EMC vApp Manager is prone to multiple arbitrary command-execution vulnerabilities. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands in context of the affected application with root privileges.

CVE-2016-6646.title: Dell EMC vApp Manager Multiple Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6646.body: EMC vApp Manager is prone to multiple arbitrary command-execution vulnerabilities. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands in context of the affected application with root privileges.

CVE-2016-6647.title: EMC ViPR SRM CVE-2016-6647 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6647.body: EMC ViPR SRM is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to ViPR SRM 4.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6650.title: EMC RecoverPoint SSL Stripping CVE-2016-6650 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6650.body: EMC RecoverPoint is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks and gain access to sensitive information, which will aid in further attacks. Following product versions are affected: EMC RecoverPoint versions prior to 5.0 EMC RecoverPoint for Virtual Machines versions prior to 5.0

CVE-2016-6652.title: Pivotal Spring Data JPA CVE-2016-6652 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6652.body: Pivotal Spring Data JPA is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. An attacker can exploit this issue to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Pivotal Spring Data JPA 1.10.2 and 1.9.4 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-6662.title: Oracle MySQL CVE-2016-6662 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6662.body: Oracle MySQL SE is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with root privileges. This issue is fixed in following products: Mysql 5.5.52, 5.6.33 and 5.7.15. Percona DB 5.7.14-7,5.6.32-78.0 and 5.5.51-38.1. MariaDB 5.5.51, 10.1.17, 10.0.27.

CVE-2016-6786.title: Google Android Multiple Privilege Escalation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6786.body: Google Android is prone to multiple privilege escalation vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute code with elevated privileges. These issues are being tracked by Android Bug IDs A-30955111 and A-31095224.

CVE-2016-6787.title: Google Android Multiple Privilege Escalation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6787.body: Google Android is prone to multiple privilege escalation vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute code with elevated privileges. These issues are being tracked by Android Bug IDs A-30955111 and A-31095224.

CVE-2016-6794.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2016-6794 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6794.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. Apache Tomcat 9.0.0.M1 through 9.0.0.M9, 8.5.0 through 8.5.4, 8.0.0.RC1 through 8.0.36, 7.0.0 through 7.0.70 and 6.0.0 through 6.0.45 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6795.title: Apache Struts CVE-2016-6795 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6795.body: Apache Struts is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve sensitive information and execute arbitrary code on server side. This may aid in further attacks. Apache Struts 2.3.20 through 2.3.30 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6801.title: Apache Jackrabbit CVE-2016-6801 Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6801.body: Apache Jackrabbit is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Apache Jackrabbit 2.4.5, 2.6.5, 2.8.2, 2.10.3, 2.12.3, and 2.13.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6804.title: Apache OpenOffice CVE-2016-6804 DLL Loading Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6804.body: Apache OpenOffice is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. A remote attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial of service condition.

CVE-2016-6808.title: Apache Tomcat JK Connector CVE-2016-6808 Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6808.body: Apache Tomcat JK Connector is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Apache Tomcat JK Connector 1.2.0 through 1.2.41 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6810.title: Apache ActiveMQ CVE-2016-6810 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6810.body: Apache ActiveMQ is prone to an unspecified HTML-injection vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Apache Active MQ versions 5.0.0 through 5.14.1 are affected.

CVE-2016-6812.title: Apache CXF CVE-2016-6812 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6812.body: Apache CXF is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Apache CXF versions prior to 3.0.12 and 3.1.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6816.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2016-6816 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6816.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. Apache Tomcat 9.0.0.M1 through 9.0.0.M11, 8.5.0 through 8.5.6, 8.0.0.RC1 through 8.0.38, 7.0.0 through 7.0.72 and 6.0.0 through 6.0.47 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6817.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2016-6817 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6817.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. The following versions are affected: Apache Tomcat 9.0.0.M1 through 9.0.0.M11 Apache Tomcat 8.5.0 through 8.5.6

CVE-2016-6820.title: NetApp MetroCluster Tiebreaker for clustered Data CVE-2016-6820 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6820.body: NetApp MetroCluster Tiebreaker for clustered Data ONTAP is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. MetroCluster Tiebreaker for clustered Data ONTAP prior to 1.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6823.title: ImageMagick CVE-2016-6823 Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6823.body: ImageMagick is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-6828.title: Linux Kernel 'tcp_xmit_retransmit_queue()' Function Use After Free Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6828.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-6833.title: Qemu CVE-2016-6833 Use After Free Memory Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6833.body: Qemu is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Note: Quick Emulator(Qemu) built with the VMWARE VMXNET3 NIC device support are vulnerable. Successful exploits will allow local attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application or cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-6837.title: MantisBT CVE-2016-6837 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6837.body: MantisBT is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-6855.title: Gnome Eye Of Gnome CVE-2016-6855 Out of Bounds Write Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6855.body: Gnome Eye Of Gnome are prone to a denial of service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the application.

CVE-2016-6882.title: MatrixSSL Multiple Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6882.body: MatrixSSL is prone to multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to perform man-in-the-middle attacks and obtain sensitive information. Successful exploits will lead to other attacks. Versions prior to MatrixSSL 3.8.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6883.title: MatrixSSL Multiple Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6883.body: MatrixSSL is prone to multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to perform man-in-the-middle attacks and obtain sensitive information. Successful exploits will lead to other attacks. Versions prior to MatrixSSL 3.8.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6884.title: MatrixSSL Multiple Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities

CVE-2016-6888.body: QEMU is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability. A privileged guest user can exploit this issue to crash the QEMU instance, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2016-6890.body: MatrixSSL is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability and multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code and cause denial-of-service conditions. MatrixSSL 3.8.5 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6891.title: MatrixSSL VU#396440 Heap Based Buffer Overflow and Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6891.body: MatrixSSL is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability and multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code and cause denial-of-service conditions. MatrixSSL 3.8.5 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6892.body: MatrixSSL is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability and multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code and cause denial-of-service conditions. MatrixSSL 3.8.5 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6893.title: GNU Mailman CVE-2016-6893 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6893.body: GNU Mailman is prone to a cross-site request forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. This may lead to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities. GNU Mailman 2.1.x versions prior to 2.1.23 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-6897.title: WordPress CVE-2016-6897 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2016-6897.body: WordPress is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. WordPress version 4.5.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-6902.title: lshell Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-6902.body: lshell is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2016-6903.title: lshell Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities

CVE-2016-6905.body: libgd is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. CVE-2016-7031.title: Red Hat Ceph CVE-2016-7031 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7031.body: Red Hat Ceph is prone to a security bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the security mechanism and perform unauthorized actions on the affected computer. This may aid in further attacks. Red Hat Ceph 0.21 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-7033.title: Red Hat JBoss BPMS CVE-2016-7033 Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-7033.body: Red Hat JBoss BPMS is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input data. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Red Hat JBoss BPMS version 6.3.2 is vulnerable.

CVE-2016-7034.title: Red Hat JBoss BPMS CVE-2016-7034 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7034.body: Red Hat JBoss BPMS is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2016-7039.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2016-7039 Stack Overflow Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7039.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Note : Linux kernel built with the 802.1Q/802.1ad VLAN(CONFIG_VLAN_8021Q) or Virtual eXtensible Local Area Network(CONFIG_VXLAN) with Transparent Ethernet Bridging(TEB) GRO support are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-7041.title: Drools CVE-2016-7041 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7041.body: Drools is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access or read arbitrary files that contain sensitive information or to access files outside of the restricted directory to obtain sensitive information and perform other attacks.

CVE-2016-7042.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2016-7042 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7042.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Note: The issue occurs when the 'gcc protector mode' is turned on.

CVE-2016-7046.title: Red Hat Undertow CVE-2016-7046 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7046.body: Red Hat Undertow is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the application to cause an infinite loop; resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-7047.body: Red Hat CloudForms Management Engine is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2016-7116.title: QEMU File Handling Multiple Directory Traversal Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-7116.body: QEMU is prone to multiple directory-traversal vulnerabilities because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. The title has been changed to better reflect the vulnerability information.

CVE-2016-7123.body: GNU Mailman is prone to a cross-site request forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. This may lead to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities. GNU Mailman versions prior to 2.1.15 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-7126.title: PHP 'ext/gd/gd.c' Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7126.body: PHP is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to PHP versions 5.6.25 and 7.0.10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-7146.body: MoinMoin is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. MoinMoinprior version 1.9.8 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. b2evolution 6.7.5 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-7168.title: WordPress Cross Site Scripting And Directory Traversal Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-7168.body: WordPress is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker can leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site and to view arbitrary local files and directories within the context of the webserver. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and gain access to sensitive information, which may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to WordPress 4.6.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-7392.title: Autotrace CVE-2016-7392 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7392.body: Autotrace is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2016-7397.title: Sophos UTM Multiple Local Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities

CVE-2016-7400.title: Exponent CMS CVE-2016-7400 Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities

An attacker can exploit these issues to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Exponent CMS 2.3.9 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-7405.title: ADOdb CVE-2016-7405 SQL Injection Vulnerability

CVE-2016-7418.title: PHP CVE-2016-7418 Out-of-Bounds Read Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7418.body: PHP is prone to an out-of-bounds read denial of service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2016-7419.title: ownCloud Gallery Application 'share.js' HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7419.body: ownCloud Gallery Application is prone to a HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied data. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. The following products are vulnerable: ownCloud Server prior to 9.0.4 Nextcloud Server prior to 9.0.52

CVE-2016-7420.title: Crypto++ CVE-2016-7420 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7420.body: Crypto++ is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2016-7424.title: Libav CVE-2016-7424 NULL Pointer Dereference Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7424.body: Libav is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability due to a NULL-pointer dereference condition. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the application using the affected library to crash, denying service to legitimate users. Libav 11.7 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-7425.title: Linux Kernel SCSI arcmsr Driver CVE-2016-7425 Local Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7425.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a local heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the kernel. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-7431.title: NTP CVE-2016-7431 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7431.body: NTP is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-7434.title: NTP CVE-2016-7434 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability

CVE-2016-7552.title: Trend Micro Threat Discovery Appliance CVE-2016-7552 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7552.body: Trend Micro Threat Discovery Appliance is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access files outside of the restricted directory and perform other attacks. Trend Micro Threat Discovery Appliance 2.6.1062r1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-7555.title: FFmpeg CVE-2016-7555 Information Disclosure Vulnerability

CVE-2016-7567.title: OpenSLP 'common/slp_compare.c' Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7567.body: OpenSLP is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. OpenSLP 2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-7568.title: libgd 'gd_webp.c' Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7568.body: libgd is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. libgd 2.2.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-7569.title: App Container docker2aci Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7569.body: App Container docker2aci is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to read arbitrary files in the context of the application. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2016-7570.title: Drupal Core Multiple Access Bypass and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-7570.body: Drupal is prone to multiple access-bypass vulnerabilities and a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the vulnerable site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, to bypass security restrictions, obtain sensitive information, or perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. Drupal 8.x versions prior to 8.1.10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-7780.title: Exponent CMS CVE-2016-7780 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7780.body: Exponent CMS is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Exponent CMS 2.3.9 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-7785.body: FFmpeg is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-7788.title: Exponent CMS CVE-2016-7788 SQL Injection Vulnerability

CVE-2016-7795.title: systemd 'manager_invoke_notify_message()' Function Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7795.body: systemd is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. systemd 209 and later versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-7796.title: systemd CVE-2016-7796 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7796.body: systemd is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. systemd 209 and later versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-7799.title: ImageMagick 'MagickCore/profile.c' Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7799.body: ImageMagick is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information or crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-7800.title: RETIRED: GraphicsMagick CVE-2016-7800 Remote Integer Underflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7800.body: GraphicsMagick is prone to a remote integer-underflow vulnerability because they fail to sufficiently validate an integer value. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. This BID is being retired as a duplicate.

CVE-2016-7800.title: GraphicsMagick CVE-2016-7800 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7800.body: GraphicsMagick is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Successful exploits may allow the attacker to crash the affected application. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2016-7802.title: Cybozu Garoon CVE-2016-7802 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7802.body: Cybozu Garoon is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access or read arbitrary files that contain sensitive information or to access files outside of the restricted directory to obtain sensitive information and perform other attacks. Cybozu Garoon 3.0.0 through 4.2.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-7803.title: Cybozu Garoon CVE-2016-7803 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7803.body: Cybozu Garoon is prone to a SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Cybozu Garoon versions 3.0.0 through 4.2.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-7806.title: I-O DATA DEVICE WFS-SR01 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-7806.body: I-O DATA DEVICE WFS-SR01 are prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute remote command or to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. WFS-SR01 firmware version 1.10 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-7808.title: Corega CG-WLBARGMH and CG-WLBARGNL Routers CVE-2016-7808 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7808.body: Corega CG-WLBARGMH and CG-WLBARGNL routers are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-7809.title: Corega CG-WLR300NX Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-7809.body: Corega CG-WLR300NX is prone to following security vulnerabilities: 1. A security bypass vulnerability 2. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 3. A cross-site request forgery vulnerability An attacker may exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, bypass security restrictions or perform unauthorized actions. Other attacks may also be possible. Corega CG-WLR300NX 1.20 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-7812.title: Bank of Tokyo Mitsubishi UFJ CVE-2016-7812 Man in the Middle Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7812.body: Bank of Tokyo Mitsubishi UFJ is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform man-in-the-middle attacks to obtain sensitive information, and perform unauthorized actions. Successful exploits will lead to other attacks. Bank of Tokyo Mitsubishi UFJ versions 5.3.1, and 5.2.2 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-7813.title: DERAEMON-CMS CVE-2016-7813 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-7813.body: DERAEMON-CMS is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. DERAEMON-CMS 0.8.9 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-7814.title: Multiple I-O DATA Network Camera Products CVE-2016-7814 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7814.body: Multiple I-O DATA Network camera products are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. The following products and versions are vulnerable: TS-WRLP firmware version 1.00.01 and prior TS-WRLA firmware version 1.00.01 and prior

CVE-2016-7817.title: Simple Keitai Chat CVE-2016-7817 Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-7817.body: Simple Keitai Chat is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2016-7818.title: Multiple Japan Pension Service Products CVE-2016-7818 DLL Loading Local Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7818.body: Multiple Japan Pension Service Products are prone to a local arbitrary code-execution vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. The following products are affected: Specification check program(social insurance) 9.00 and prior. TODOKESHO print program 5.00 and prior. Device data encryption program 1.00 and prior. TODOKESHO creation program 15.00 and prior.

CVE-2016-7842.title: AttacheCase CVE-2016-7842 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-7842.body: AttacheCase is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. This may aid in further attacks. Following product versions are affected: AttacheCase 2.8.2.8 and prior AttacheCase 3.2.0.4 and prior

CVE-2016-8016.body: McAfee VirusScan Enterprise is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple authentication bypass vulnerabilities. 2. A cross-site scripting vulnerability. 7. Multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to obtain potentially sensitive information, steal cookie based authentication credentials, perform unauthorized action, bypass authentication mechanism, execute arbitrary code, read arbitrary files that contain sensitive information and arbitrary headers to a webpage. VirusScan Enterprise for Linux (VSEL) 2.0.3 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-8027.title: McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator CVE-2016-8027 SQL Injection Vulnerabilitiy
CVE-2016-8027.body: McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue by manipulating the SQL query logic to carry out unauthorized actions on the underlying database. Successfully exploiting this issue may lead to remote code-execution; however, it has not been confirmed. McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator 5.3.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-8031.title: McAfee Anti-Malware Scan CVE-2016-8031 Engine Multiple Local Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-8031.body: McAfee Anti-Malware Scan Engine is prone to multiple local security-bypass vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions in the affected application, which may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2016-8106.title: Multiple Intel Ethernet Controller CVE-2016-8106 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8106.body: Multiple Intel Ethernet Controller are prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Intel Ethernet Controller's X710/XL710 prior to 5.05 version are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-8201.title: Brocade Virtual Traffic Manager CVE-2016-8201 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8201.body: Brocade Virtual Traffic Manager is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Brocade Virtual Traffic Manager versions prior to and including 11.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-8202.title: HP StoreFabric B-series Switches CVE-2016-8202 Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8202.body: HP StoreFabric B-series Switches are prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. A remote attacker can leverage this issue to gain elevated privileges within the context of affected system. HP StoreFabric B-series Switches FOS versions prior to 7.4.1d and 8.0.1b are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-8203.title: Brocade NetIron OS CVE-2016-8203 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8203.body: Brocade NetIron OS is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. Brocade NetIron OS 5.8.00 through 5.8.00e, 5.9.00 through 5.9.00bd, 6.0.00, and 6.0.00a are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-8211.title: EMC Data Protection Advisor CVE-2016-8211 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8211.body: EMC Data Protection Advisor is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. A remote attacker could exploit the vulnerability using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access arbitrary files that contain sensitive information. The following versions are vulnerable: EMC Data Protection Advisor 6.1.x EMC Data Protection Advisor 6.2 EMC Data Protection Advisor 6.2.1 EMC Data Protection Advisor 6.2.2 EMC Data Protection Advisor 6.2.3 prior to patch 446

CVE-2016-8213.title: Multiple EMC Products CVE-2016-8213 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8213.body: Multiple EMC Products are prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2016-8215.title: EMC RSA Security Analytics CVE-2016-8215 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8215.body: EMC RSA Security Analytics is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to RSA Security Analytics 10.6.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-8216.title: EMC Data Domain OS CVE-2016-8216 Local Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8216.body: EMC Data Domain OS is prone to a local command-injection vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the Data Domain restricted shell (ddsh) to gain shell access and execute arbitrary commands with root privileges.

CVE-2016-8217.title: EMC RSA BSAFE Crypto-J Security Bypass and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-8217.body: EMC RSA BSAFE Crypto-J is prone to security-bypass vulnerability and an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit these issues to bypass security restrictions and gain access to potentially sensitive information. This may aid in other attacks. Versions prior to RSA BSAFE Crypto-J 6.2.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-8232.title: IBM BladeCenter Advanced Management Module CVE-2016-8232 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8232.body: IBM BladeCenter Advanced Management Module is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. IBM BladeCenter Advanced Management Module running firmware versions prior to 3.66z are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-8286.title: Oracle MySQL CVE-2016-8286 Remote Security Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8286.body: Oracle MySQL is prone to a remote security vulnerability. The vulnerability can be exploited over the 'MySQL Protocol' protocol. The 'Server: Security: Privileges' sub component is affected. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: 5.7.14 and earlier

CVE-2016-8289.title: Oracle MySQL CVE-2016-8289 Local Security Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8289.body: Oracle MySQL is prone to a local security vulnerability. The 'Server: InnoDB' sub component is affected. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: 5.7.13 and earlier

CVE-2016-8294.title: Oracle PeopleSoft Enterprise PeopleTools CVE-2016-8294 Remote Security Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8294.body: Oracle PeopleSoft Enterprise PeopleTools is prone to a remote security vulnerability. The vulnerability can be exploited over the 'HTTP' protocol. The 'Query' sub component is affected. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: 8.54, 8.55

CVE-2016-8295.title: Oracle PeopleSoft Enterprise HCM CVE-2016-8295 Remote Security Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8295.body: Oracle PeopleSoft Enterprise HCM is prone to a remote security vulnerability. The vulnerability can be exploited over the 'HTTP' protocol. The 'Schedule' sub component is affected. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: 9.2

CVE-2016-8302.body: Oracle FLEXCUBE Universal Banking is prone to a remote security vulnerability. The vulnerability can be exploited over the 'HTTP' protocol. The 'Core' sub component is affected. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: 11.3.0, 11.4.0, 12.0.1, 12.0.2, 12.0.3, 12.1.0, 12.2.0

CVE-2016-8313.title: Oracle FLEXCUBE Private Banking CVE-2016-8313 Remote Security Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8313.body: Oracle FLEXCUBE Private Banking is prone to a remote security vulnerability. The vulnerability can be exploited over the 'HTTP' protocol. CVE-2016-8332.title: OpenJPEG CVE-2016-8332 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8332.body: OpenJPEG is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-8333.title: Iceni Argus 'ipfSetColourStroke()' Function Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8333.body: Iceni Argus is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-8334.title: Foxit Reader CVE-2016-8334 Out of Bounds Read Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8334.body: Foxit Reader is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2016-8335.title: Iceni Argus 'ipNameAdd()' Function Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8335.body: Iceni Argus is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-8339.title: Redis CVE-2016-8339 Out of Bounds Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8339.body: Redis is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-8341.title: Ecava IntegraXor CVE-2016-8341 Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-8341.body: Ecava IntegraXor is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. IntegraXor version 5.0.413.0 is vulnerable.

CVE-2016-8343.title: INDAS Web SCADA CVE-2016-8343 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8343.body: INDAS Web SCADA is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve arbitrary files in the context of the application. This may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to INDAS Web SCADA 3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-8344.title: Honeywell Experion PKS CVE-2016-8344 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8344.body: Honeywell Experion PKS is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to cause the process to terminate; resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-8347.title: Kabona AB WDC ICSA-16-287-07 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-8347.body: Kabona AB WDC is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, this may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks or by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it and when an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site and to bypass the authentication mechanism. Versions prior to Kabona AB WDC 3.4.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-8350.title: Moxa ioLogik E1200 Series Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-8350.body: Moxa ioLogik is prone to the following security vulnerabilities. 1. A cross-site request forgery vulnerability 2. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 3. Multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities An attacker can exploit these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials,bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2016-8352.title: Schneider Electric ConneXium CVE-2016-8352 Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-8352.body: Schneider Electric ConneXium is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the system using the ActiveX control. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. The following ConneXium firewall versions are vulnerable: TCSEFEC23F3F20 TCSEFEC23F3F21 TCSEFEC23FCF20 TCSEFEC23FCF21 TCSEFEC2CF3F20

CVE-2016-8364.body: IBHsoftec S7-SoftPLC is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. CVE-2016-8946.title: IBM Emptoris Sourcing Multiple Cross Site Scripting and Open Redirection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-8946.body: IBM Emptoris Sourcing is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and an open-redirection vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, this may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks or by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it and when an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site. IBM Emptoris Sourcing 9.5.x through 10.1.x are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9031.body: Joyent SmartOS is prone to an local integer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-9032.body: Joyent SmartOS is prone to a local stack -based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Joyent SmartOS OS 20161110T013148Z is vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9108.title: Artifex MuJS 'regexp.c' Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9108.body: Artifex MuJS is prone to an integer-overflow because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2016-9113.body: OpenJPEG is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. OpenJPEG 2.1.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2016-9115.title: OpenJPEG 'convert.c' CVE-2016-9115 Remote Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9115.body: OpenJPEG is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. OpenJPEG 2.1.2 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

An HTML-injection vulnerability Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application, gain elevated privileges and allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Trend Micro InterScan Web Security Virtual Appliance 6.5 is vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9445.title: GStreamer Bad Plug-ins CVE-2016-9445 Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9445.body: GStreamer Bad Plug-ins is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of a user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-9448.title: LibTIFF 'tif_dirread.c' Incomplete Fix Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9448.body: LibTIFF is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. LibTIFF 4.0.6 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected. Note: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for issue described in 94419 (LibTIFF 'tif_print.c' Out Of Bounds Read Denial of Service Vulnerability).

CVE-2016-9449.title: Drupal Core Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-9449.body: Drupal is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. An information-disclosure vulnerability 2. Multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities 3. A denial-of-service vulnerability An attacker can exploit these issues to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions, obtain sensitive information and cause denial-of-service conditions, to construct a crafted URI and entice a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Drupal 7.x versions prior to 7.52 and 8.x versions prior to 8.2.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9457.title: Revive Adserver Multiple Security Vulnerabilities

An information disclosure vulnerability An attacker can exploit these issues to bypass the authentication mechanism,gain unauthorized access, execute attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code in the context of the affected site,steal cookie-based authentication credentials, obtain potentially sensitive information.These may aid in further attacks. CVE-2016-9459.title: ownCloud and Nextcloud CVE-2016-9459 HTML Injection Vulnerability

CVE-2016-9928.body: MCabber is prone to a security-bypass Vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks. MCabber 1.0.3 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9932.title: Xen CVE-2016-9932 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9932.body: Xen is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. Xen versions 3.3 through 4.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9933.title: PHP 'src/gd.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9933.body: PHP is prone to a denial of service vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to exhaust the resources, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-9934.title: PHP 'ext/wddx/wddx.c' NULL pointer Dereference Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9934.body: PHP is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. PHP versions prior to 5.6.28, 7.1.0 and 7.0.13 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9935.title: PHP 'ext/wddx/wddx.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9935.body: PHP is prone to a denial of service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-9936.title: PHP 'ext/standard/var.c' Incomplete Fix Use After Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9936.body: PHP is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. PHP 7.0.10 and prior are vulnerable. Note : This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for the CVE-2015-6834 described in BID 76649 (PHP CVE-2015-6834 Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities).

CVE-2016-9937.title: Asterisk Open Source AST-2016-008 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9937.body: Asterisk Open Source is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-9939.title: Crypto++ CVE-2016-9939 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9939.body: Crypto++ is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition; denying service to legitimate users. A local attacker can exploit this issue to cause resource exhaustion leading to a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2016-9941.title: LibVNCServer Multiple Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-9941.body: LibVNCServer is prone to multiple heap based buffer overflow vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to LibVNCServer 0.9.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9942.title: LibVNCServer Multiple Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-9942.body: LibVNCServer is prone to multiple heap based buffer overflow vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to LibVNCServer 0.9.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9949.title: Apport Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-9949.body: Apport is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities. 1. A remote-code execution vulnerability. 2. Multiple directory-traversal vulnerabilities 3. A denial-of-service vulnerability. Exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application or to obtain sensitive information that could aid in further attacks. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to Apport 2.20.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9954.title: Irregex CVE-2016-9954 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9954.body: Irregex is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to consume excessive memory resources, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2016-9957.title: Game Music Emulators Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2016-9957.body: Game Music Emulators is prone to multiple memory-corruption vulnerabilities. Exploiting these issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or trigger denial-of-service conditions, denying services to legitimate users. Versions prior to game-music-emu 0.6.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9972.title: IBM QRadar SIEM CVE-2016-9972 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9972.body: IBM QRadar Security Information and Event Management is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2016-9973.title: IBM Jazz Foundation CVE-2016-9973 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9973.body: IBM Jazz Foundation is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2016-9977.title: IBM Maximo Asset Management CVE-2016-9977 Session Hijacking Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9977.body: IBM Maximo Asset Management is prone to a session-hijacking vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to gain unauthorized access to the affected application.

CVE-2016-9982.title: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator CVE-2016-9982 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9982.body: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to obtain sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. IBM Sterling B2B Integrator 5.2, 5.2.1, 5.2.2, 5.2.3, 5.2.4, 5.2.5, and 5.2.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2016-9983.title: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator CVE-2016-9983 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2016-9983.body: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to obtain sensitive information. CVE-2016-9986.body: IBM Jazz Reporting Service is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and an information disclosure vulnerability. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or gain access to sensitive information. Jazz Reporting Service 5.0, 5.0.1, 5.0.2, 6.0, 6.0.1, 6.0.2, and 6.0.3 are vulnerable.
